summary:
Re-texture of blades of sithis into Sasuke Swords.
Added male and female Uchiha Shirt=Requested
Added Banners=Requested
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11046-1-1337021117.png[/img][/center]


[size=5][b]Originally[/b][/size] 
Name: Blades of Sithis
Version: 1.5b
Date: 12/5/2011
Category: Weapons 
Authors: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=341894 ] AlexScorpion [/url]
Source: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2715 ] Blades of Sithis[/url]

[size=5][b]Description[/b][/size]
===========
Two completly new swords along with uchiha prisoner clothes.
Added Banners on Request

[size=5][b]Location[/b][/size]
========
[color=CB59E8][b]You can buy these ninjatos from Eorlund in White Run.[/b][/color]
[color=CB59E8][b]The Roughspun Tunic/ Prisoner outfit just open the command prompt and type player.additem 0003c9fe 1[/b][/color]

[size=5][b]Install[/b][/size]
=======
Use Nexus mod manager

[size=5][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]
=========
Use nexus mod manager.


[size=5][b]Contact[/b][/size]
=======
You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as AlexScorpion
You can find me on TESNexus as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=341894 ] AlexScorpion [/url]
You can find the re-texture Author here[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2809472 ] Exoshinoizme [/url] 

[size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size]
=======
Thanks to Jaysus for his tutorial, PHATE 3 and Ghogiel for some tips.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=4585342] Cosmic Castaway [/url] For renaming them & adding the enchanted effects (lighting)
Thanks to God for creating us all.

[size=5][b]Tools Used[/b][/size]
==========
[url=http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579] 7-Zip [/url]
[url= http://www.autodesk.com/3dsmax ] 3D Studio Max[/url]
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope ]NIFSkope[/url]
[url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/ ] Photoshop [/url]
[url= http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2114 ] TESsnip [/url]
[url=http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp ] Readme Generator [/url]

[size=5][b]Licensing/Legal[/b][/size]
===============
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 2 weeks, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: Exoshinoizme
